block.p: AMERICAN GENERAL, Houston, named John V. LaGrasse, most recently executive vice president for information technology at its life insurance division, to the post of executive vice president and chief technology officer.

BRADLEES INC., Braintree, Mass., named J. Gregory Ambro senior vice president and chief financial officer, succeeding Neil Moses, who resigned. Mr. Ambro had most recently been chief financial officer at Streamline.com.

AMERICAN GENERAL, Houston, named John V. LaGrasse, most recently executive vice president for information technology at its life insurance division, to the post of executive vice president and chief technology officer.

BRADLEES INC., Braintree, Mass., named J. Gregory Ambro senior vice president and chief financial officer, succeeding Neil Moses, who resigned. Mr. Ambro had most recently been chief financial officer at Streamline.com.
IBS INTERACTIVE, Cedar Knolls, N.J., named Roy E. Crippen III, director and chief operating officer, to the post of president. He succeeds Nick Loglisci Jr., who remains chairman and chief executive.
